name: Your home (itch)
description:
emmmm……怎么说呢，

这是我利用空闲时间在RPG Maker MV上的作品，也是我第一次做游戏。本来想用Game Maker制作，但是那玩意儿目前对我有一丢丢难度……

我想了一个小故事并且把它用在了游戏里，但是我文笔不太好哈，故事或许不太完美，谅解一下……(—_—)

部分素材来源于Steam上的DLC以及RPG Maker软件自带(嗯我美术也不行)。

如果你想反馈BUG或者提供建议，请发送至我的邮箱：mr_command@163.com

总之……可以的话……玩的开心。

……

应该……不止一个结局吧……？

特别感谢：Zymarkt

emmmm......How should I put it...

This is a work I spend 40 hours on RPG Maker MV in my free time, and it's also my first time making games. I wanted to use Game Maker at first, but it's a little difficult for me...

I thought a little story and used it in the game. I'm not good at writing stories, so maybe the story is not good, I'll improve myself in the future.

Some of the tilesets and pictures are from DLCs in Steam and RPG Maker(yes i'm not good at art too...).

If you have some BUGs to report or want to give me some advice, please E-mail me: mr_command@163.com

Well... Have a good time.

......

And...Maybe not only one ending...?

Special thanks: Zymarkt

(English is not supported now. I'll translate as soon as possible)
